1.title: Not to turn away from your own flesh and blood (Is 58:7)

2.title: Do away with the pointing finger and malicious talk (Is 58:9)

3.title: Spend yourselves in behalf of the hungry (Is 58:10)

4.title: Provide the poor wanderer with shelter (Is 58:7)

5.title: Rebuild the ancient ruins and raise up the age-old foundations (Is 58:12)
